What library is used to train the diffusion model?
The diffusion model is trained using the ğŸ¤— Diffusers library.
What dataset is the diffusion model trained on?
The diffusion model is trained on the `{{ dataset_name }}` dataset.
What is the learning rate used during training?
The learning rate used during training is {{ learning_rate }}.
What is the train batch size used during training?
The train batch size used during training is {{ train_batch_size }}.
What is the eval batch size used during training?
The eval batch size used during training is {{ eval_batch_size }}.
What is the optimizer used during training?
The optimizer used during training is AdamW with betas=({{ adam_beta1 }}, {{ adam_beta2 }}), weight_decay={{ adam_weight_decay }} and epsilon={{ adam_epsilon }}.
What is the lr_scheduler used during training?
The lr_scheduler used during training is {{ lr_scheduler }}.
What is the value of ema_inv_gamma during training?
The value of ema_inv_gamma during training is {{ ema_inv_gamma }}.
